com.tumblr.permissme

Interface PermissMe.PermissionListener

  • Enclosing class:
    PermissMe

    public static interface PermissMe.PermissionListener
    Listener that can be used to receive a callback for the permission request made.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onOptionalPermissionDenied(String[] deniedPermissions, boolean[] isAutoDenied)
      The callback when optional permissions were ungranted.
      void onRequiredPermissionDenied(String[] deniedPermissions, boolean[] isAutoDenied)
      The callback when required permissions were ungranted
      void onSuccess()
      The callback when required permissions were granted by the user (does not guarantee optional permissions were granted.

    • Method Detail

      • onSuccess

        void onSuccess()
        The callback when required permissions were granted by the user (does not guarantee optional permissions were granted. This callback occurs even when optional permissions were denied)

      • onRequiredPermissionDenied

        void onRequiredPermissionDenied(String[] deniedPermissions,
                              boolean[] isAutoDenied)
        The callback when required permissions were ungranted
        Parameters:
        deniedPermissions - the denied required permissions that were queried for
        isAutoDenied - an array of booleans indicating whether the deniedPermissions were auto-denied, ergo, the user previously or currently checked "Never ask again" on the permission dialog. Each boolean is associated with a permission in the deniedPermissions list A Snackbar is shown by default telling the user to turn the permission on with an action button that will take them to the app's settings. Caller can specify turning the snackbar off using PermissMe.Builder.showNoUIOnFailure() to handle this by themselves.

      • onOptionalPermissionDenied

        void onOptionalPermissionDenied(String[] deniedPermissions,
                              boolean[] isAutoDenied)
        The callback when optional permissions were ungranted. onSuccess() will still be called because the permissions were optional. This method is provided if you want to do logging or perform any special operations when optional permissions were denied. Denying optional permissions should still allow the operation the user was trying to execute to continue.
        Parameters:
        deniedPermissions - the denied optional permissions that were queried for
        isAutoDenied - an array of booleans indicating whether the deniedPermissions were auto-denied, ergo, the user previously or currently checked "Never ask again" on the permission dialog. Each boolean is associated with a permission in the deniedPermissions list
